pageContext.description: Fine striations on blade, filing?,Straight stop-ridge "with semi-eliptical ornament below. the Central rib runs from the centre of stop-ridge through the ornament down the blade"

pageContext.associations: 4 Palstaves. Lay beneath a buried menir-like stone 6' below the surface, with a 5th palstave and a spearhead (both disappeared).
